title: Chorded Keyboard
alt: And even though it all went wrong / I'll stand before the lord of song / with nothing on my tongue but 'I don't understand, I swear I backed up my keyboard config before messing with it'
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting in an office chair at his desk, hands on his keyboard, looking at his desktop. Lyrical text is written upon each scene as an unspoken narration]
I heard there was a secret chord
That David pressed and it typed a word[A closeup on Cueball. We see him from the waist up]
But you don't use a chorded keyboard, do you[The third frame is like the first, except Cueball's arms are moved]
It goes like this, <control> and <shift>
The other hand hits H and <left>[The fourth frame is like the first and third, but the arms are moved again. The final written word of text is marked as arising directly from the computer monitor]
And all at once it types out
Monitor: Hallelujah
